      • hasAdjustRoom

        public static boolean hasAdjustRoom(double target,
                                    LimitType targetLimit,
                                    double resource,
                                    LimitType resourceLimit,
                                    boolean positiveSen)
        The resource variable is used to adjust the target variable. In the case of target variable violation, check if the resource has adjustment room to change the target variable.
        Parameters:
        target - target variable to be controlled
        targetLimit - target variable limit
        resource - resource variable to be adjusted to control the target variable
        resourceLimit - resource variable limit
        positiveSen - adjustment sensitivity sign. If positive, increase the resource variable will result in increasing target variable.
        Returns:

      • discreteValue

        public static double discreteValue(double value,
                                   int numSteps,
                                   double stepSize)
